name: Zombie
languages: understands the languages it knew in life but can't speak

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 5 (1d6+2) bludgeoning damage. The target is grappled (escape DC 12) if it is a Medium or smaller creature, and the zombie doesn't already have a creature grappled.

bonus_actions.name: Rotten Hold
bonus_actions.desc: The zombie gnaws idly on the creature grappled by it. The target must succeed on a DC 12 CON save or take 2 (1d4) poison damage. A Humanoid slain by this bonus action rises 24 hours later as a zombie, unless the Humanoid is restored to life or its body is destroyed.

special_abilities.name: Undead Fortitude
special_abilities.desc: If damage reduces the zombie to 0 HP, it must make a CON save with a DC equal to 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the zombie drops to 1 HP instead.

special_abilities.name: Undead Nature
special_abilities.desc: The zombie doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

special_abilities.name: Undead Resilience
special_abilities.desc: The zombie is immune to poison damage, to exhaustion, and to the poisoned condition.
